name.value: Nictiz MedMij BgZ Extended - PHR Client - Scenario 1.2 - Retrieve BgZ Extended

description.value: MedMij BgZ Extended test dataset for FHIR STU3 - Scenario 1.2: Retrieve BgZ Extended - All BgZ resources of person 2. Responses consists of empty searchset Bundle resources execpt for the Patient resource.
MedMij-Request-ID, by default a UUID. Does not have to be edited, see MM-2254 for more information

Test PHR Client retrieve search operation for known Patient resource of person 2 including the patient's general practitioner. The expected response code is 200(OK) and content is a searchset Bundle resource with 0 entries.
PHR Server retrieve search operation for known Patient, including the reference practitioner resource.
Confirm that the client did not request a Content-Type. Warning only to allow for systems that automatically send Content-Type.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that query parameter 'patient=' was not present to avoid BSNs in the URL.
Confirm that query parameter 'subject=' was not present to avoid BSNs in the URL.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.

Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 0 entries or has an OperationOutcome as first entry.
